name: Fast Food Wheel
description:
Can't decide on the fast food you feel like eating.

Give the Wheel a spin and let fate choose for you.

If you don't agree with fate, press the "Spin Again" button.

Click the "Near Me" button and it will take you to Google Maps for the place near you that the wheel choose.

Enjoy. 

Check out the  Meal Wheel or  Dessert Wheel

More wheels coming soon.
